txt.en:
'Shame? Why, the gall of that Man! I would go and speak with Rauno myself, if I had not already had a falling out with him.

'I innocently inquired after the making of his craft, but he would not speak on the subject. We exchanged a number of words, and now he will not say a word to me! He is an evil-tempered lout; I would not think his silence a great loss were it not for my present need.

'Perhaps you could speak with him and see if he will give me one of the sturdy shields of the Lossoth. I will not be able to travel back to the South without a new shield!'

'I wonder that this shield remained unsundered for as long as it did, [placeholder]. Its craftsmanship is very poor and the materials from which it is made are of poor quality.\n\n'I will not repair this worthless shield. I would bring shame upon myself and my family if I did so.'
Time for a New Shield
'The kilpi is finished. Take it to Nef, and bid him to seek his companions and return to his own home.'

'I do not cherish the thought of making a shield for Nef. He came to me with wild requests, and when I told him what I had at hand for materials, he said many things that I will not repeat now. I do not need to offend your ears also.

'But if he will not leave until his shield is completed, I will make it, if only to see him depart. The items that I require would be hard-bone and worm scale. Both are rare, and both are vital to the making of kilpi -- shields, as the Kivi-väki calls them.

'Hard bone can be found on many of the beasts throughout Jä-rannit, while worm scale should be found on the worms of the same region. Return to me when you have found these items, and I will craft the shield for the small outsider with the long beard and bad temper.'
Collected hard bones  ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I am sure it won't be as good as new, but perhaps the Snow-men will repair my shield.'
'You have returned with the hard bones and worm scales? I will begin work on the kilpi right away. It should not take long, as I have already completed much of the work while you were away.'
Collected worm scales ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Had I another choice, I would not ask the Snow-men for another shield, but there are no other smiths to do the work.'
'Have you recovered any hard bones and worm scales yet, [placeholder]?'
The Lossoth craftsmen are in the Great Lodge in Sûri-kylä, west of Nef.\n\nNef has asked you to speak with the Lossoth craftsmen to learn if they are able to repair his broken shield.
'Is the shield finished? What did Rauno say?'
'Well now...this looks like a decent piece of work.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder]. This should do, though I will want to replace it with something a bit more durable once I reach Bree again.'
Nef is in Sûri-kylä, east from the Great Lodge.\n\nYou should return to Nef and tell him what you learned from Rauno.
'I would be shamed if I repaired this shield, for it is an unworthy piece.'
'Has Rauno finished my shield yet?'
Rauno is in Sûri-kylä, west from Nef in the Great Lodge of Sûri-kylä.\n\nNef has asked you to return to Rauno and try to convince him to craft a new shield for him.
'If I am to make a new kilpi for this Nef, I will need hard bone and worm-scales.'

Hard bone can be found on beasts throughout Jä-rannit. Worm scale can be found on worms throughout Jä-rannit.\n\nRauno has asked you to collect hard bones and worm scales so that he may make a shield for Nef.
'I hope never to see the short one ever again.'
Rauno is in Sûri-kylä, north from where you collected the items he requested.\n\nYou should bring the hard bones and worm scales to Rauno so he can complete Nef's shield.
'I will have to talk to that Bill Ferny fellow about the shield he sold me.'
Rauno is in Sûri-kylä.\n\nYou should speak with Rauno to see if Nef's shield is ready.
Nef is in Sûri-kylä, east from Rauno.\n\nRauno told you to take the shield he made to Nef and bid him leave Sûri-kylä.
'A new shield, Baruk Khazâd!'
'But... how will I afford to repair such a wonderful shield?'
'How could you have done this to me!?!'
'This is not fair; you must share with me the cost to repair my new shield!'
Talk to the Lossoth craftsmen
Talk to Nef
Talk to Rauno
'It will not be long now, I have only to attach the bone and scales.'
Talk to Rauno
Collect hard bones  ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect worm scales ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring hard bones and worm scales to Rauno
Get the shield from Rauno
Bring the shield to Nef
You found Nef's shield, but it had been broken by the beast that drove him off.

'Bah! This will not do at all! What is a guardian without his shield? He is but half a dwarf, I reckon. I will not be satisfied until I have my shield repaired.

'Go and speak with the Lossoth craftsmen here in Sûri-kylä. They are strange Men, but perhaps they will be able to repair it. Otherwise, I do not know what I will do.

'The Lossoth craftsmen can be found inside the Great Lodge in Sûri-kylä. Now, run along! I will not have you waste any more time hovering about like a gnat.'
